#summary The Semanticscience Integrated Ontology (SIO)
#sidebar SIOSideBar

= Introduction =

The Semanticscience Integrated Ontology (SIO) provides a simple, integrated ontology of types and relations for rich description of objects, processes and their attributes. The SIO paper has now been  [http://www.jbiomedsem.com/content/5/1/14 published].

The OWL2 ontology is available at http://semanticscience.org/ontology/sio.owl

view at
 * bioportal: [http://bioportal.bioontology.org/ontologies/SIO sio@bioportal]

This project provides ontological support for 
 * [http://bio2rdf.org Bio2RDF] Linked Data for the Life Sciences
 * [http://sadiframework.org SADI] Semantic Web Service.   
 * [http://rdf.imim.es/DisGeNET.html DisGeNET]'s gene-disease associations
 * The NCBI's [http://pubchem.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/rdf/ PubChem] for measurement values
 * The EBI's [http://www.ebi.ac.uk/rdf/documentation/atlas Gene Expression Atlas]  .


= Details =

Documentation is under development. Design patterns are being defined, which are listed on the left hand pane.  If you have questions please send to SIO mailing list (sio-ontology@googlegroups.com; http://groups.google.com/group/sio-ontology)
